technique_1.explaination: This technique originates from the Few-shot technique where we provide GPT-3 a sample conversation between patient and doctor (few-shot learning) to see if GPT-3 is able to understand the context better.

technique_2.explaination: Following up on the Chain-of-Thought prompting technique, by providing a list of diseases and their associated symptoms in the prompt, GPT-3 responses start to really improve. Since GPT-3 knows which symptoms are related to which disease, it is able to question with confidence about the symptoms that the patient has. For the list of diseases and corresponding symptoms, I have used the kaggle disease & symptom dataset.
